New Trait?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): New Trait?
By Fire Activist on Tuesday, August 8, 2006 - 06:36 pm:

When you go into the final sequence to finish the game, you go into a one-on-one battle. As I always do, I first go to "Info, Enemy" to find their strengths and weaknesses. I noticed that the monster (details hidden for people who haven't been there) had a trait that was available only to them. Does this have any imporance at all, and could you use a .~~~ editor to get it?

By Lil_Literalist on Tuesday, December 19, 2006 - 09:36 am:

That trait can probably be put on your monster using a cheating device, but why would you want to? It would be better if you didn't use the cheating device at all.
